title: WorldSkills Azerbaijan: Web Technologies
description: Qualified for the Republican (National) round of WorldSkills Azerbaijan in Web Technologies. Over a high-intensity 2-day period, successfully executed complex full-stack development tasks, including UI/UX design (Photoshop), frontend development (HTML/CSS/JS/React), and backend logic. Handled challenging real-world projects and rigorous technical requirements, demonstrating speed, precision, and comprehensive technical expertise under competitive pressure.
